duties_responsibilities.duty: Own and oversee your area of the business with excellence
Hold the team accountable to Chick-fil-A standards alongside other Directors
Train and develop team leaders and members through coaching, feedback, and goal setting
Ensure operational effectiveness to grow revenue
Perform with excellence while in the busy, fast-paced environment of the business
Meet regularly with the Owner/Operator for development
Lead with clear communication; monitor and increase team member retention
Demonstrate good stewardship of the business and resources
Lead with character, competency, and chemistry
Demonstrates drive and initiative to identify and solve problems

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business Management, Leadership, or a related field (Master's preferred)
